document_data.name: Burtrar Malith
document_data.Personality: Burtar was particularly quiet and grim.
document_data.Relationships: Burtat acted completely loyal to [[Mhair Gulzrabban]], so as not to be deemed expendable yet wished to one day betray the party's leader and retire.
